text: hi, the content.previous_post_slug jumps from language to language, It doesnt go to the next post of the current language. Any experience with such an issue?

Hey All - working with a customer and they had these questions when it regards to smart content and personalization:

• We have a sub-set of users that will need to be shown specific (local) content but for the most part, their content needs will be similar to all other users - they should be able to use smart content here. 
• Can we use Smart Content rules in the main website header to display additional local content to specific users (known and anonymous)? - this is the one I am not sure of and looks like it is not possible?
• Can we create a subfolder that or subdomain that leverages global content from another website? - Not sure here either.
Any guidance would be extremely helpful!
